content.rendered: Onna Hair shall make every reasonable effort to protect its systems against any form of unlawful use. Onna Hair shall implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to this end, taking into account, among other things, the state of the art. However, it shall not be liable for any loss whatsoever, direct and/or indirect, suffered by a user of the website, which arises as a result of the unlawful use of its systems by a third party.
